title: Marketing and Sales Course
desc: Learn how to create marketing strategies and improve sales using digital tools like Google Ads and social media analytics. Software used: Google Ads (Free with paid campaigns), Meta Business Suite (Free), HubSpot CRM (Free and premium options).

title: Financial Management Course
desc: Understand financial principles, budgeting, and investment strategies to manage business finances effectively. Software used: QuickBooks (Subscription-based), Microsoft Excel (Subscription-based), Wave Accounting (Free).

title: Project Management Course
desc: Master project management methodologies like Agile and Scrum to enhance team collaboration and efficiency. Software used: Trello (Free with premium options), Asana (Free with premium options), Jira (Trial version available).

title: E-commerce and Online Business Course
desc: Learn how to set up and run an online business using platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, and Amazon FBA. Software used: Shopify (Trial available), WooCommerce (Free with paid plugins), Amazon Seller Central (Subscription-based).

title: Negotiation and Communication Course
desc: Develop negotiation skills and effective communication techniques for business success. Software used: Zoom (Free with premium options), Google Meet (Free), Slack (Free with premium options).
